snippet: Fifteen detainees who had been listed as participants stopped taking part in the protest at the prison in Cuba, an American military spokesman said, accelerating an apparent downward trend.
abstract: Fifteen detainees at military prison at Gauntanamo Bay, Cuba, cease participation in hunger strike, accelerating apparent downward trend since start of Ramadan; official announces that 81 of 166 prisoners are still taking part in strike.
lead_paragraph: Fifteen detainees who had been listed as participants stopped taking part in the protest at the prison in Cuba, an American military spokesman said, accelerating an apparent downward trend.

headline.main: 15 Held at Guantánamo Are Said to Quit Hunger Strike
headline.print_headline: 15 Held at Guantánamo Are Said to Quit Hunger Strike
